title: News View :: The World On Arirang
text: A nationwide earthquake evacuation drill will be held today at 2PM, Korea time, as party of a week-long disaster response training program in South Korea.Public institutions, including those associated with central and local administrations, schools, daycare centers, as well as some voluntary private organizations will take part.However, government branches focused on containing the African swine fever outbreak and recovery operations in areas hit by Typhoon Mitag will be exempt.A siren will sound to signal the start of the exercise.During the drill, twelve radio stations will air a 20-minute live broadcast on preventive measures during earthquakesHowever, unlike some other drills in South Korea, traffic will not be restricted.
description: 한국을 대표하는 글로벌 방송! The World On Arirang!
